title: North Carolina Senate OKs limits on LGBTQ school instruction
description: North Carolina’s Republican-controlled Senate has passed a bill requiring teachers to alert parents before calling their child by a different name or pronoun
author: HANNAH SCHOENBAUM Associated Press/Report for America

title: Appeals court backs North Carolina AG Stein on libel law
description: A federal appeals court has sided again with North Carolina’s attorney general in a lawsuit involving a libel law that a district attorney sought to use to attempt to prosecute Josh Stein over a 2020 campaign commercial
author: GARY D. ROBERTSON Associated Press

title: DA says libel case against N. Carolina Attorney General over
description: A local North Carolina prosecutor says campaign-related charges won’t be pursued further against Attorney General Josh Stein or his aides in light of a federal appeals court ruling this week
author: GARY D. ROBERTSON Associated Press

title: Bill raising riot penalties in North Carolina clears House
description: A bill increasing punishments for violent protests following the 2020 demonstrations over George Floyd’s murder passed the House despite harsh criticism from social justice advocates
author: GARY D. ROBERTSON and HANNAH SCHOENBAUM Associated Press

title: North Carolina Senate OKs limits on LGBTQ school instruction
description: North Carolina’s Republican-controlled Senate has passed a bill requiring teachers to alert parents before calling their child by a different name or pronoun
author: HANNAH SCHOENBAUM Associated Press/Report for America

title: Appeals court backs North Carolina AG Stein on libel law

title: Bill raising riot penalties in North Carolina clears House
description: A bill increasing punishments for violent protests following the 2020 demonstrations over George Floyd’s murder passed the House despite harsh criticism from social justice advocates
author: GARY D. ROBERTSON and HANNAH SCHOENBAUM Associated Press

title: North Carolina legislature confirms Nels Roseland as state controller
description: The North Carolina legislature has confirmed Nels Roseland as state controller on Wednesday. Roseland was confirmed by unanimous vote in both the House and Senate.
author: Associated Press

title: North Carolina Senate approves bill addressing hotel guest rights
description: The North Carolina Senate approved a bill Thursday that addresses hotel guest rights. Democrats say the bill could harm citizens that are fearful of being thrown out of their home.
author: Associated Press

title: North Carolina Senate OKs limits on LGBTQ school instruction
description: Public school teachers in North Carolina would be required in most circumstances to alert parents before they call a student by a different name or pronoun, under a bill passed by the Republican-controlled state Senate on Tuesday.
author: Associated Press

title: Democratic governors, seeing rising threats, look beyond their borders
description: Democratic state leaders see a federal government hamstrung to protect rights and see red-state governors pushing to restrict those rights.
author: Dan Balz

title: Duke takes down North Carolina, earning coach Jon Scheyer his first win in rivalry
description: Saturday's Duke-North Carolina game was the first since 1957 to be staged with neither Dean Smith nor Mike Krzyzewski on the sidelines.
author: The Fayetteville Observer, David Thompson, The Fayetteville Observer
